Trade/Device Name(s): C-Reactive Protein (Latex) High Sensitive test system for COBAS Integra instruments
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Roche C-Reactive Protein (Latex) High Sensitive immunoturbidimetric assay for COBAS Integra analyzers to quantitatively measure CRP in serum and plasma.
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative determination of C-reactive protein (CRP) in human serum and plasma; useful for detecting and evaluating inflammatory disorders, infections, tissue injury, and as an aid in coronary heart disease risk assessment and prognosis in acute coronary syndromes.
